subject: p10402372
raw_hist: Bronchiectasis and pseudomonas, cough, persistent tachycardia, evaluation.
raw_find: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Moderate-to-severe overinflation with known areas of bronchiectasis and perifocal parenchymal opacities. The opacities are unchanged in distribution and severity. Normal size of the cardiac silhouette. Normal hilar and mediastinal structures. No newly appeared focal parenchymal changes.
